title: A recap of Quarkus Tools for IntelliJ's latest improvements
content: Quarkus Tools for IntelliJ is a free and open source extension, helping users develop Quarkus applications by providing content-assist, validation, run configurations and many other features right from their favourite IDE. This extension is based on the LSP4MP (i.e. MicroProfile) and its Quarkus add-on, and the Qute language server. These...
